meanings.definition: One who pedals, especially a cyclist.
meanings.sent1: The pedaler rode his bike to the park.
meanings.sent2: The cyclist is a skilled pedaler.
meanings.sent3: The pedaler tried to pedal backward for fun.
meanings.sent4: She was a pedaler of dreams, always chasing new adventures.
meanings.sent5: The pedaler's legs moved like pistons, propelling the bike forward.

meanings.definition: A person or machine that operates a pedal.
meanings.sent1: The musician was a talented pedaler of the piano.
meanings.sent2: The sewing machine pedaler worked smoothly under her foot.
meanings.sent3: The pedaler of the car accidentally hit the gas instead of the brake.
meanings.sent4: He was a pedaler of rhythm, creating music with every step.
meanings.sent5: The pedaler of the exercise bike kept a steady pace throughout the class.
